data.text: Mũrũ wakwa, ũngĩtĩkĩra ciugo ciakwa,
nakuo gũtũ gwaku ũgũtegere ũũgĩ,
na ũngĩgaakayũrũrũka na ũhooe gũkũũrana maũndũ,
na ũngĩkawetha ta betha,
hĩndĩ ĩyo nĩũgataũkĩrwo nĩ ũhoro wa gwĩtigĩra Jehova,
Nĩgũkorwo Jehova aheanaga ũũgĩ,
Andũ arĩa arũngĩrĩru amaigĩire ũhootani,
nĩgũkorwo nĩarangagĩra njĩra cia arĩa marũmagĩrĩra kĩhooto,
Hĩndĩ ĩyo nĩũgakũũrana maũndũ marĩa magĩrĩire,
Nĩgũkorwo ũũgĩ nĩũgatoonya ngoro yaku,
ũgereri nĩũrĩkũgitagĩra,
Ũũgĩ nĩũgakũhonokia kuuma njĩra-inĩ cia andũ arĩa aaganu,
o arĩa matigaga njĩra iria nũngĩrĩru,
arĩa makenaga magĩĩka ũũru,
na no-o arĩa njĩra ciao ciogomete,
Ũũgĩ nĩũgakũhonokia kuuma harĩ mũtumia ũrĩa mũtharia,
ũcio ũtigĩte mũratawe wa ũnini wake,
Nĩgũkorwo nyũmba yake ĩroragia andũ gĩkuũ-inĩ,
Gũtirĩ mũndũ ũthiiaga harĩ we agacooka,
No rĩrĩ, wee nĩũrĩthiiaga na mĩthiĩre ya andũ arĩa ega,
Nĩgũkorwo andũ arĩa arũngĩrĩru nĩo magaatũũra bũrũri-inĩ,
no rĩrĩ, andũ arĩa aaganu nĩmakeeherio bũrũri-inĩ,
